Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RV-23 (UCLL1; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 2.5 uM), S. aureus (MIC 40 uM) and  C. albicans (MIC 80 uM).Also inhibit bovine and caprine herpesviruses, canine distemper virus, bovine viral diarrhea virus, and Schmallenberg virus (Chianese et al., 2023).Toxicity:  moderate hemolytic HC50 35 uM. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021; 9/2023
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Al-Ghafari N, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H, Davidson C.2006
Literature Information.Title: Evidence from peptidomic analysis of skin secretions that the red-legged frogs, Rana aurora draytonii and Rana aurora aurora, are distinct species.
